item.description: Kelly's back on the mic to chat about Costco, Huntie's latest playground antics, Dad to Daddy moments of the week and...as much anticipated, more of THE STORY!

item.itunes:title: The Morning After Bye Week #14
item.description:
On this week's episode, Kelly talks about the bye week, airs her grievances on a few issues, shares a proud parenting moment & more!
Please support our sponsors! item.title: The Morning After The NFL Gambled with a Life
item.itunes:title: The Morning After The NFL Gambled with a Life
item.description: Today's episode is a little more serious, as Kelly discusses Tua's head injury and her biggest parenting failure, with a heavy heart. The show ends on a lighter note with more "dad to daddy" stories!

item.title: The Morning After Becoming A Pool Pee-er
item.itunes:title: The Morning After Becoming A Pool Pee-er
item.description:
Kelly is in the studio after her relaxing away-game weekend at home. She chats about the football weekend, peeing in pools, the perils of grocery shopping and more!
Please support the sponsors: Better Help - The Morning After is sponsored by Better Help. Visit BetterHelp.com/MorningAfter to get 10% off your first month

item.title: The Morning After Winning A World Series
item.itunes:title: The Morning After Winning A World Series
item.description: Kelly is in the studio with a special guest, Chelsea Freeman! item.title: The Morning After Matthew's Ex Comes to Town
item.itunes:title: The Morning After Matthew's Ex Comes to Town
item.description: It's the morning after the Detroit game! Kelly breaks down her weekend and the emotions involved with her best friend, Hank Winchester. The two discuss Lions fans in LA, celebrating after the win, celebrities in their neighborhood, telling the twins apart and much more. There's even a special guest appearance at the top of the show... enjoy!The Morning After podcast is produced by ACTIONPARK MEDIA. Follow us on Social Media:@actionparkmediagroup @kbstafford89@themorningafter.kellystafford

item.title: The Morning After Getting Cancelled
item.itunes:title: The Morning After Getting Cancelled
item.description: Kelly is back from New York to discuss her fun weekend in the city and shares a few slip ups she made along the way! She discusses cancel culture, how to teach your kids about making mistakes, and shares the story of the day she met Matthew & their first 24 hours together.The Morning After podcast is produced by ACTIONPARK MEDIA. item.title: The Morning After: Matthew Comes Home to a Shit Ton of Halloween Decorations
item.itunes:title: The Morning After: Matthew Comes Home to a Shit Ton of Halloween Decorations
item.description: Kelly is in her new studio at Actionpark Media to discuss her kids sucking at soccer, drinking in high school, how she feels about fans taking photos and more. She's then joined by fellow Rams wives, Melissa Whitworth and Anna Kupp, to disucss their game day experience in Seattle, Kelly having a mortifying moment on the plane ride up, how they all met their husbands and much more!The Morning After podcast is produced by ACTIONPARK MEDIA. Follow us on Social Media:@actionparkmediagroup @kbstafford89@themorningafter.kellystafford

item.description: IVF... something that should be talked about more, whether you're going through it or not, it's something everyone should try to understand.

item.title: The morning after you find out it’s damn hard to be a parent these days.
item.itunes:title: The morning after you find out it’s damn hard to be a parent these days.
item.description: My mom and I dive into differences of being a parent now vs. back when she was, her first impression of Matthew, and how she handled hearing here daughter was diagnosed with a brain tumor. Just talking about real parent shit, no filters.
